dsense.name: right hand
dsense.guideword: (hand on the right side of the body)

example.eg: I write with my right hand, I'm right handed.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 左膀右臂的, 股肱的

dsense.name: right-hand
dsense.guideword: (rope: with strands twisted left to right) (线绳)

example.eg: Julia's my right-hand man when it comes to planning parties.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最得力的助手, 左臂右膀

dsense.name: right-hand person, right-hand man, right-hand woman

example.eg: Mary was my right-hand woman on this assignment.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 得力助手, 左膀右臂
